remarks.para: This structure supersedes the IMAGEHLP_LINE structure. For more information, see Updated Platform Support. IMAGEHLP_LINE is defined as follows in DbgHelp.h.

summary.para: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member to sizeof(IMAGEHLP_LINE64).
This member is reserved for use by the operating system.
The line number in the file.
The name of the file, including the full path.
The address of the first instruction in the line.
